articles.author: Niket Nishant
articles.title: Global banks rattled after Moody's cuts, Italy windfall tax - Reuters
articles.description: Global bank shares skidded on Tuesday after Moody's downgraded 10 mid-sized U.S. banks and Italy
articles.content: Aug 8 (Reuters) - Global bank shares skidded on Tuesday after Moody's downgraded 10 mid-sized U.S. banks and Italy approved a surprise 40% windfall tax on lenders, with the double-blow reigniting con… [+3934 chars]
